description: Christmas wouldn't be complete without a delicious batch of fruit mince pies. Learn how to make this classic Christmas dessert with this easy recipe.
name: Easy Fruit Mince Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush pastry with a little egg. Bake for 20 minutes or until pastry is golden. Allow to cool slightly for 5 minutes. Serve.
